documents.document: Survived day one alright, but that could be because the house is full of visitors till after the weekend
So today I start a period of being a stay at home dad - I'll try and make updates to document my journey into madness
I feel like the #trump administration should come with a disclaimer "The views expressed here do not reflect the views of normal Americans"
@MLamentB I'm undecided if it's better or worse that those shirts don't have 'Pearl Jam' on them anywhere
@MLamentB Shit! I was wearing mine yesterday while painting a wall
@Fifth_Opinion Mike Mills is a damn hero you fool!
@PearlJam @MikeMcCreadyPJ Looks to me like someone needs to head to NZ a little more often
@skitchP @chris_mecca @markieburnhope I have no idea what's going on right now
Meant to be in middle of a #WeatherBomb - strange l can't tell much difference between this and weather we've been having all summer so far
With all this talk about #ChelseaManning can we please not forget to acknowledge that today is #BettyWhiteBDay
@thewarehouse Your staff in Tauranga might need training on putting disks in cases. Home from holiday to find I bought 2 empty blu-ray cases
@JBHiFiNZ how do I go about finding out if an @onkyo reciever I bought from you is covered by the company's Customer Care Program?
@kalpenn Batman Returns is a great Christmas movie!
Pretty excited to see @wolfmother will be supporting @gunsnroses for their New Zealand shows.
@bierman_rob Aren't you a little short to be a Stormtrooper?
So it turns out that I'm the parent of that 1 year old kid who beats up the other kids at church. I'm now 'that guy'
@Fifth_Opinion I was expecting Adam Sandler, Tommy Cruiser, and Philip Seymour Hoffman
I love how my daughter will now bring the cat an offering of a toy, and when the cat doesn't accept the toy my daughter whacks her
@RussellPirkle @YoSounie @chuckpalahniuk Not sure I really care who that is either
@eqnz You're 'wife' alert seems to not be working. She let me sleep through last nights jolt, I heard it was a good one too
@DreamBabySafety Thanks for giving me the means to cage up my little one. Now she has her own area of destruction https://t.co/JTxwnJ23YQ
Brian Tamaki could learn a thing or two from The Rock church - this is how you address the recent earthquakes whichâ€¦ https://t.co/EcfQuqHnGA
Someone bought my daughter a pop-up picture book for her birthday and she's absolutely loosing her mind over it!
Just rescued a bird that flew into one of our windows from our cat and dog. Took a while, but the bird has flown off now Feeling pretty good
I see the Seventh Circuit just denied Brendan Dassey's release pending appeal outcome. Will they never let this kid get to #WrestleMania?
@david75donovan Bet they were playing Scotland the Brave!
@david75donovan I thought it was wildly known that 'a galaxy far far away' was in fact The Highlands
I see Brian Tamaki is getting himself in the news again by being the most unchristian of Christian leaders
So yesterday houses were wrecked due to the shaking, today can't see neighbours place due to mist. Is there about to be a big rebuild reveal
Oh how I had missed you aftershocks #eqnz
Thanks @MightyApe for super quick delivery once again and great service!
@EataylorTweets She's way past hinting!
Guess this is pretty much like fighters touching gloves before a match
Each morning my dog and cat have a ritual of touching noses before going off and being mortal enemies for the rest of the day.
Halloween-that one time of year where kids go and ask neighbours they've never talked to for stuff before ignoring them for rest of the year
For the past week whenever I get home from work my 11 month old gets all excited,holds her arms up to me and yells 'Dadda!' - melts my heart
@NightTerrorsApp Will this be getting a full IOS release before there's anything for android?
My wife was talking with me the other day about how men are losing their identity - I know she was secretly telling me to start a fight club
@catswithbats Although not something I'd personally wear - I'm thinking there's something I'm missing. What's wrong with it?
@DreamBabySafety Done! Thank you!
@DreamBabySafety Loving how your MAYFAIR CONVERTA 3-IN-1 PLAY-PEN GATE says that extensions are available on the box, but no one stocks them
I wonder how many people turn up to the emergency room cause their toddler has taken them out. Thinking it's only time before that's me
Now I know how god felt when he put Adam and Eve in the garden of Eden.
I give my daughter free reign of the lounge - except one area. That's the only place she now wants to go.
I wish my wife an I had that relationship where 'Dibs not!' still meant something and that I didn't have to fix everything around the house
Random gym question/observation: Does a bicep curl count if you don't look lovingly at your bicep whilst doing it?
@NightTerrorsApp Android release?
I felt a disturbance in the Force, as if millions of ppl suddenly hopped on Gareth Edwards' nuts, and were gushing like children. #RogueOne
Successfully managed to pull apart and fix my sons' x-box after my 10 month old got her hands on it. I'm gonna take that as a win.
My daughter was given free reign of the living room last night while dinner was being prepared. Anyone know how to fix an x-box and stereo?
I emailed back reiterating that I didn't want the money and tried to engage him in a conversation about greed. He stopped Emailing me.
I Emailed beck Mr Johnson Abu - telling him I had no need for his $6 million. He replied asking for my bank account details immediately
At the time I was all 'Whoa - who is it???' But now I've realised I don't really care who's on Lucille's receiving end #TheWalkingDead
@MLamentB Stay safe buddy! Hope this doesn't end up being as bad as is currently forecast
@MLamentB Are you getting out of town bud, or are you going to ride it out?
@Fifth_Opinion Did you see that there's a remake coming out next year?
@VancityReynolds You have very long fingers sir!
Wife: Can you read our daughter a book Me: You want a balloon? We all float down here Wife: What are you reading her? Me: Some clown story
@peternclarke I love how the first comment on that picture is the obligatory 'return to argentina please'
@NateDiaz209 are you worried that some of the shine will be taken off your rematch when @Ealvarezfight finishes @TheNotoriousMMA at #UFC205
Having watched @TaikaWaititi shut down @StephenPitalo complaining about the dumbest of issues was a beautiful thing
@Shihad_Band what are the odds of you guys doing a Welly show outside of Homegrown next year?
@TaikaWaititi Finally got my hands on a copy of Hunt for the Wilderpeople - what an amazing film with so many great moments!
Link on article I'm reading '29 movie mistakes we'll never forgive', has a picture of Forrest Gump. But I'll forgive that simpleton anything
Turns out Rock, Paper, scissors isn't an appropriate way of making business decisions in our office...
@BoomsdayDevice You misspelt Dave Matthews Band
My girl can now stand in her cot and reach the baby monitor - putting her to bed is like watching a cute version of The Blair Witch Project
@Fifth_Opinion Mel is a god amongst men!
I'm convinced my 10 month old daughter's dialect is way more advanced then my own
Last night my daughter screamed at me. I screamed back and she gave me one of those 'I thought you were supposed to be the adult here' looks
@NightTerrorsApp How long before we can get our grubby hands on an android version?
@BoomsdayDevice Take that back! Mel knows what's up!
Well this day just got a whole lot better. Mr Johnson Abu from the Bank Of Africa wants to split $6 million with me.
@GeorgesStPierre watched through a couple of times, but can't figure out why ur character has broken arm at the end of #KickboxerVengeance
@BearGrylls what a great read to be given on Father's Day https://t.co/aMDyadbmT7
Got woken at 4:37am with a bit of a shake - way too early to get up and try and catch a wave, so just went back to sleep. #eqnz
@ryansawrie @MLamentB For the people on the floor - that set up would be great if you don't want to actually see the performer
@thesky_iscrape ....CD Included
My dog seems to have my wife convinced that we have a ghost in the house.
@JOEbodeCLARK Can't wait to get my greasy little hands on a copy!
@BoomsdayDevice @PearlJam fans are the worst!
I don't like that I now have to scroll down through a list of years to find my birth year when doing online questionnaires
My weekend stint acting as a debt collector/enforcer was a bust as I came away empty handed.Maybe it's time to rethink my tactics
@catswithbats Why would you be giving away this masterpiece?
Great fight - respect to both fighters for putting it all on the line. Not sure I agree with the final scorecard however #UFC202
@McJustTweeted What is Crystal Pepsi? Is it like Meth?
@BoomsdayDevice I'm pretty excited about this. Been way too long since we've had new stuff from these guys
@FlyBuysNZ Cheers for the Rebate Planer - gave it a hoon the other day - great piece of machinery.
@catswithbats I saw one event just before while at the gym - NZ lost in a big way... and I stopped paying attention
8 months old. About 50. https://t.co/vdMXLk1Xk9
@chriscornell Thanks, but I think I'll pass - that was awful!
@chris_mecca I think that may still be some time away given the look she gives me when she's feeding
What is an appropriate age to give an infant the 'There's a lot of starving children in Africa who would love this food' talk?
Sprayed dog repellent over tubing that our dog keeps chewing away at. Went outside a few minutes later to find her licking the repellent off
@jasonleejitsu Bro glad to hear that your safe. Disappointing that you had to leave Rio. This whole thing has been 1 giant shit-storm
Theme of Barack Obama's speech will be - 'Yeah, I know she's not ideal, but she's still better than the alternative!'
@JOEbodeCLARK Took me a while to see any people in that photo - I thought you were trying to make some 'sad reflection on life' post
@AnnaS_JBnz @JBHiFiNZ This has now all been sorted and the order dispatched. Thanks for your help!
@jasonleejitsu Might be time to move back to NZ bro. Kkia kaha - hope this all gets sorted soon
